fullText: Kristin Chenoweth is in glorious voice and radiant form as the tempestuous Lily Garland, bringing both vocal pyrotechnics and comic timing to this deliriously over-the-top musical comedy.
dtliExcerpt: Kristin Chenoweth is in glorious voice and radiant form as the tempestuous Lily Garland, bringing both vocal pyrotechnics and comic timing to this deliriously over-the-top musical comedy.
bwwExcerpt: Scott Ellis's dazzling production of 'On the Twentieth Century' looks like one of those legendary Broadway musicals that exists largely in our collective memory of great shows we never saw. Like those phantom productions, this 1978 tuner comes with a fine pedigree (book & lyrics by Comden & Green, music by Cy Coleman), has been mounted in high style and is performed with manic energy by a super cast toplined by charismatic stars Kirsten Chenoweth and Peter Gallagher. For a lot of us, this is the show of our dreams.
